CCPR22=#{ccpr22,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CCPR23=#{ccpr23,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CCPR24=#{ccpr24,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE AAB001=#{aab001}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM AB01 WHERE AAB001=#{aab001}
SELECT aab001 FROM AB01
SELECT * FROM V_AB01 WHERE AAB001=#{aab001} and CCPR08=0

SELECT t.aab001,t.aab003,t.aab004,t.aae004,t.aae005,t.aae006,t.aae013,t.aae007,t.aab007,t.acb206,t.aab113,t.aae139,t.aab115,t.aab114, t.aab010,t.aab011,t.aab013,aab014,t.aab026,t.aab052,t.aab053,t.aae036,t.aae019,t.aab049, t.aae020,t.bab002 ,t.aaa021,t.aae015,t.aae016,t.aab01e,t.aab01f,t.aab01g,y.name as aab020 ,f.name as aab054, s.name as aab021, b.name as aab023,u.name as aab019,l.name as aab025,d.name as aab048,r.name as acb101,n.name as aab022 FROM AB01 t LEFT JOIN TAB_ECONOMIC y ON y.code=t.aab020 LEFT JOIN TAB_INDUSTRYCLASSES f ON f.code=t.aab054 LEFT JOIN TAB_RELATIONSHIP s ON s.code=t.aab021 LEFT JOIN TAB_DEPARTMENT b ON b.code=t.aab023 LEFT JOIN TAB_UNITNATURE u ON u.code=t.aab019 LEFT JOIN TAB_INDETIL l ON l.code=t.aab025 LEFT JOIN TAB_BUSMOD d ON d.code=t.aab048 LEFT JOIN TAB_ENJOYPRI r ON r.code=t.acb101 LEFT JOIN TAB_INDUSTRY n ON n.code=t.aab022 WHERE t.aab001 = #{aab001} AND t.ccpr08 = 0

SELECT a.*,e.imgCount,f.videoCount,g.seniorJobCount FROM AB01 a ,ccm01 b , (select nvl(count(*),0) as jobSum,aab001 from cb21 where ACB208 = 0 and ABB773=1 and CCPR08 = 0 group by aab001 ) c, (select count(*) as imgCount,aab001 from CAO04 where CAOA04=6 and caoa07=1 and ccpr08=0 and aab001 is not null group by aab001 ) e, (select count(*) as videoCount,aab001 from CAO04 where CAOA04=7 and caoa07=1 and ccpr08=0 and aab001 is not null group by aab001 )f, (select count(*) as seniorJobCount,AAB001 from cb21 cb where ACB210 IN (SELECT JOBID FROM CAA03 T WHERE T.CAAC01 IN(SELECT CAAC01 FROM CAA01 WHERE INDENT ='seniorJob') and cb.ACB208 = 0 and cb.ABB773=1 and cb.CCPR08 = 0 ) GROUP BY AAB001)g where a.ccmu01=b.ccmu01 and b.ccmu10=1 and b.CCPR08=0 and a.AAE119=1 and c.aab001=a.aab001 and jobSum>0 and e.aab001(+)=a.aab001 and f.aab001(+)=a.aab001 and g.aab001(+)=a.aab001 order by AAE036 desc
SELECT , b.name as certificateTypeName FROM AB01 a LEFT JOIN TAB_UCT b ON b.code = a.AAB006 LEFT JOIN INDUSTRY_AS ia ON ia.id=a.ccpr10 WHERE ccmu01=#{ccmu01}

SELECT , b.name as economicTypeName,c.name as corpTypeName,d.name as scaleName FROM AB01 a LEFT JOIN TAB_ECONOMIC b ON b.code = a.aab020 LEFT JOIN TAB_unitnature c ON c.code = a.aab019 LEFT JOIN TAB_PSCALE d ON d.code = a.aab056 WHERE aab001=#{aab001}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT t2.aac001, t2.aac003,t2.aac004,t.bca112,t2.ccmu01,t3.ccmu15,t_wy.name as aac038n,t_ed.name as aac011n, f_get_age(to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),to_char(t2.aac006,'yyyy-mm-dd')) as acb223n, row_number() over(partition by t2.aac001 order by t2.aac001) rn
FROM cc20 t,ac01 t2,ccm01 t3,tab_workyears t_wy,tab_education t_ed WHERE t.aac001 = t2.aac001 and t3.ccmu01=t2.ccmu01 and t2.aac038=t_wy.code and t2.aac011=t_ed.code and t.bca111 in ( select t.bca111 from cb21 t,ab01 t2 where t.aab001 = t2.aab001 and t2.ccmu01 =#{ccmu01} ) )WHERE rn=1
SELECT t.aac001, t.aac003,t.bca112,t.ccmu01,t.acb223n,t.aac011n,t.bcb202,t.ccmu15,t.aac038n ,t.aac004 FROM v_wz_resume_list t
SELECT CCMU02,CABQ08N,ECZY06,CAHY02,CAHY05,CCMU19 FROM V_AB01 WHERE AAB001=#{aab001}

select d.aab001, nvl(h.name,'其他') as UNITNATURE, i.name as PSCALE , nvl(k.name,'其他') as INDUSTRY, nvl(d.AAE004,'暂未提供联系人') as AAE004, nvl(d.AAE005,'暂未提供联系电话') as AAE005, nvl(d.AAE006,'暂未提供地址') as AAE006, d.AAE139, nvl(d.ACB205,'暂未提供路线信息') as ACB205, z.CCMU15, d.AAB004, nvl(d.CABQ08,'0') as CABQ08, d.CABQ01, d.CABQ02, d.CABQ03, d.CABQ04, d.CCMU01, nvl(e.imgcount,'0') as IMGCOUNT, nvl(f.videCount,'0') as VIDECOUNT, nvl(g.noticeCount,'0') as NOTICECOUNT , nvl(m.collectCorpCount,'0') as COLLECTCORPCOUNT from ab01 d,ccm01 z , (select count(*) as imgCount,aab001 from CAO04 where CAOA04=6 and caoa07=1 and ccpr08=0 and aab001 is not null group by aab001 ) e, (select count(*) as videCount,aab001 from CAO04 where CAOA04=7 and caoa07=1 and ccpr08=0 and aab001 is not null group by aab001 )f , (select count(*) as noticeCount,be_notice_user_id from my_notice group by be_notice_user_id )g , (select count(*) as collectCorpCount,be_collect_user_id from my_collect group by be_collect_user_id )m , TAB_UNITNATURE h, TAB_PSCALE i, INDUSTRY_as k where d.ccmu01=z.ccmu01(+) and d.aab001=e.aab001(+) and d.aab001=f.aab001(+) and d.CCMU01=g.be_notice_user_id(+) and h.code(+)= d.aab019 and i.code(+)= d.AAB056 and k.id(+)= d.AAB022 and d.ccmu01 = m.be_collect_user_id(+) and d.aab001 in ( select aab001 from cb21 where acb210 = #{acb210})

select d.aab001, nvl(h.name,'其他') as UNITNATURE, i.name as PSCALE , nvl(k.name,'其他') as INDUSTRY, nvl(d.AAE004,'暂未提供联系人') as AAE004, nvl(d.AAE005,'暂未提供联系电话') as AAE005, nvl(d.AAE006,'暂未提供地址') as AAE006, d.AAE139, nvl(d.ACB205,'暂未提供路线信息') as ACB205, z.CCMU15, d.AAB004, nvl(d.CABQ08,'0') as CABQ08, d.CABQ01, d.CABQ02, d.CABQ03, d.CABQ04, d.CCMU01, nvl(e.imgcount,'0') as IMGCOUNT, nvl(f.videCount,'0') as VIDECOUNT, nvl(g.noticeCount,'0') as NOTICECOUNT, nvl(m.jobCount,'0') as JOBCOUNT, nvl(p.collectCorpCount,'0') as COLLECTCORPCOUNT from ab01 d,ccm01 z , (select count(*) as imgCount,aab001 from CAO04 where CAOA04=6 and caoa07=1 and ccpr08=0 and aab001 is not null group by aab001 ) e, (select count(*) as videCount,aab001 from CAO04 where CAOA04=7 and caoa07=1 and ccpr08=0 and aab001 is not null group by aab001 )f , (select count(*) as noticeCount,be_notice_user_id from my_notice group by be_notice_user_id )g , (select count(*) as jobCount,cc.aab001 from cb21 cc, cb20 cb where cc.acb200= cb.acb200 and cb.ACB201=2 and cc.ACB208 = 0 and cc.ABB773=1 and cc.CCPR08 = 0 group by cc.aab001 ) m , TAB_UNITNATURE h, TAB_PSCALE i, INDUSTRY_as k , (select count(*) as collectCorpCount,be_collect_user_id from my_collect group by be_collect_user_id ) p where d.ccmu01=z.ccmu01(+) and d.aab001=e.aab001(+) and d.aab001=f.aab001(+) and d.CCMU01=g.be_notice_user_id(+) and d.aab001=m.aab001(+) and h.code(+)= d.aab019 and i.code(+)= d.AAB056 and k.id(+)= d.AAB022 and d.ccmu01 = p.be_collect_user_id(+) and d.aab001 = #{aab001}
select ACB206 from ab01 where aab001 = #{aab001}

SELECT AAE020,ECZY06,COUNT(1) AS CORPNUM
,${columnname} as columnname ,'' AS COLUMNNAME
FROM V_AB01 WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY AAE020,ECZY06 ,${groupname}
SELECT COUNT(1) AS TOTALNUM FROM V_AB01 WHERE 1=1

SELECT COUNT(1) AS CORPNUM ,${columnname} as COLUMNNAME FROM V_AB01 WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY ${groupname}

when.if: AND AAE017 IN ( SELECT ACD200 FROM CD20 M START WITH M.ACD200= #{curr_org} CONNECT BY M.AAB034=PRIOR M.ACD200 )

mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM AB01 where aab001 in (${aab001s}) and AAE017 != #{opOrgId}
